      • authentication

        public boolean authentication(java.lang.String authorization)
        PushClient authentication
        Parameters:
        authorization - URL encoded string contains the authentication sent by PushClient
        Returns:
        true if valid and false if invalid

      • authentication

        public boolean authentication(java.lang.String authorization,
                              java.lang.String serverAddress,
                              java.lang.String applicationName,
                              java.lang.String applicationVersion,
                              java.lang.String userAgent)
        Pusher authentication
        Parameters:
        authorization - URL encoded string contains the authentication sent by PushClient
        serverAddress - IP address of the pusher server. It must be public static IP address. If IP address is not registered, PushServer ask administrator to validate that IP address is correct and allow to send the notification
        applicationName - Application version of the pusher
        applicationVersion - Application name of the pusher
        userAgent - User agent of the pusher
        Returns:
        true if valid and false if invalid

                              java.lang.String applicationName,
                              java.lang.String applicationVersion,
                              java.lang.String userAgent)
        Create group
        Parameters:
        body - Data sent by the client
        remoteAddress - Remote address
        applicationName - Application version of the pusher
        applicationVersion - Application name of the pusher
        userAgent - User agent of the pusher
        Returns:
        JSONObject contains group creation information

      • addPusherAddress

        public void addPusherAddress(java.lang.String serverAddress,
                             java.lang.String applicationName,
                             java.lang.String applicationVersion,
                             java.lang.String userAgent)
        Confirm address in order the pusher can send the notification. This method will insert an IP address of the pusher and to be confirmed manually
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - IP address of the pusher
        applicationName - Application version of the pusher
        applicationVersion - Application name of the pusher
        userAgent - User agent of the pusher

      • addPusherAddress

        public void addPusherAddress(java.lang.String serverAddress,
                             java.lang.String applicationName,
                             java.lang.String applicationVersion,
                             java.lang.String userAgent,
                             boolean needConfirmation,
                             boolean active)
        Confirm address in order the pusher can send the notification. This method will insert an IP address of the pusher and to be confirmed manually
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - IP address of the pusher
        applicationName - Application version of the pusher
        applicationVersion - Application name of the pusher
        userAgent - User agent of the pusher
        needConfirmation - Need confirmation
        active - Active

      • sendMail

        public void sendMail(long pusherAddressID,
                     java.lang.String auth,
                     java.lang.String remoteAddress,
                     java.lang.String applicationName,
                     java.lang.String applicationVersion,
                     java.lang.String userAgent,
                     java.lang.String time)
        Send mail when new pusher address need confirmation
        Parameters:
        pusherAddressID - Pusher address ID
        auth - Authentication key
        remoteAddress - Pusher address
        applicationName - Application version of the pusher
        applicationVersion - Application name of the pusher
        userAgent - User agent of the pusher
        time - Time sent

      • insert

        public JSONObject insert(java.lang.String body)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         JSONException,
                         DatabaseTypeException
        Insert notification
        Parameters:
        body - String contains JSONObject of the notification. Pusher only send one notification message to PushServer but possible to send it to several devices
        Returns:
        JSONArray of JSONObject contains notification ID and destination device ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors
        JSONException - if any JSON errors
        DatabaseTypeException - if database type not supported

      • insert

        public JSONObject insert(JSONObject request)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         DatabaseTypeException
        Insert notification
        Parameters:
        request - JSONObject of the notification. Pusher only send one notification message to PushServer but possible to send it to several devices
        Returns:
        JSONObject contains notification ID and destination device ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors
        DatabaseTypeException - if database type not supported

        deviceID - Device ID
        Returns:

      • delete

        public JSONObject delete(java.lang.String body)
        Delete notification stored in the database
        Parameters:
        body - String contains JSONArray of pairs of notification ID and device ID. Pusher must send notification ID and device that will be deleted. PushServer only will delete the notification if notification ID, device ID and API ID is match
        Returns:
        JSONArray contains notification ID and device ID of the deletion

      • delete

        public JSONArray delete(long apiID,
                        java.lang.String deviceID,
                        long groupID,
                        long id)
        Delete notification stored in the database
        Parameters:
        apiID - API ID
        deviceID - Device ID
        id - Notification ID
        groupID - Group ID
        Returns:
        JSONArray contains notification ID and device ID of the deletion
